summary: The diff adds a deployment guide document but does not show any concrete deployment/publish implementation or configuration changes that would update the production site to the latest draft build. There are also metadata/documentation summary updates not explicitly requested by REQ-18.

missing_requirements.requirement: Publish (deploy) the current draft build to the production site so that the live site reflects the latest draft version.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only adds a deployment runbook/guide; it does not include any actual deploy action, CI/CD pipeline/config, environment/hosting configuration, or other changes that would perform or trigger a production publish. Acceptance criteria require the production site to be updated, which is not evidenced by documentation alone.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata updated to describe product features (site theme, stories, image uploads, daily verse, etc.) unrelated to the operational publish/deploy request.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-18 is an operational publish action with a constraint to avoid product feature changes; updating feature descriptions/records is not requested as part of deploying the current draft to production.

hallucinated_features.description: Frontend feature inventory/summary updated to include many UI/auth/image upload/route details beyond deployment documentation.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-18 only asks to publish the current draft to production; changing/refreshing a broad frontend file summary is not requested by the deploy requirement and may violate the constraint to avoid unrelated product changes.
